node.title: The Myth of Meritocracy in Open Source
node.description: Open source communities often incorrectly assume that everyone is equally able to contribute. The reality is far different.

node.title: Supercharge your Static Site or Blog with Gridsome
node.description: Make your static site or blog work for you with the Gridsome static site generator.

node.description: Tips and tricks for configuring NixOS, a declarative, immutable Linux distribution.

node.title: Using ZSH with Toolbox on Fedora Silverblue 33
node.description: Setup your own customized shell within Fedora Toolbox, all while maintaining convenience features from the default shell.
